name: predetermined
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decided or arranged at an earlier time: At a predetermined time, we'll all shout "Happy birthday, David!" When grain prices fall below a predetermined level, the government provides funds. See
predetermine
More examplesFewer examplesThe licence will expire after a predetermined number of years.The horse was sold for a predetermined price.Getting enough calcium and physical activity helps bones achieve their genetically predetermined strength.
